story_parts.text: The giraffe stretched her neck and looked around the Savannah. She had been born here and had never left. She had seen many changes in her lifetime - the trees had grown taller, the animals had changed, and the humans had come and gone. But she was content in her home and didn't see the need to leave.

next_options.0: The giraffe decided to explore the Savannah and see what had changed
next_options.1: The giraffe saw a lion approaching and ran away
